sentence: The Generals were able to bring in the high-profile running backs Herschel Walker and Mike Rozier, as well as quarterback Doug Flutie, into the league in one of the most shocking moves in the brief battle between the NFL and USFL.

sentence: President Joe Biden has axed Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz from advisory roles with the Presidents Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition due to their current candidacies for the U.S. Senate.

title: Why President Biden fired Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz from a federal fitness council
